articles.title: DPRK Delegation Returns Home
articles.content:
DPRK Delegation Returns Home 
						
 Pyongyang, April 28 (KCNA) -- A DPRK delegation headed by Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly, returned home on Tuesday after taking part in the Asian-African summit and celebrations of the 60th anniversary of the Asian-African Conference (Bandung Conference) and the 10th anniversary of the establishment of the new Asian-African strategic partnership held in Indonesia.

articles.title: Talks Held between SPA Chairman and IPU Secretary General
articles.content:
Talks Held between SPA Chairman and IPU Secretary General
						
 Pyongyang, April 28 (KCNA) -- Talks between Choe Thae Bok, chairman of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, and Martin Chungong, secretary general of the Inter-Parliamentary Union, were held at the Mansudae Assembly Hall on Tuesday.
					 Present there from the DPRK side were Ri Hye Jong, vice-chairperson of the SPA, officials concerned and from the opposite side were the secretary general's party.
					
					 At the talks both sides exchanged views on the issue of developing the relations between the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly and the IPU and other issues of mutual concern.

articles.title: Greetings to Union Solidarity and Development Party of Myanmar
articles.content:
Greetings to Union Solidarity and Development Party of Myanmar
						
 Pyongyang, April 28 (KCNA) -- The Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea Tuesday sent a message of greeting to the Central Committee of the Union Solidarity and Development Party of Myanmar on the occasion of the 5th founding anniversary of the party. 
					 The message said the WPK is pleased with the great successes made by the Myanmar party in its work to defend the sovereignty of the country and achieve the national reconciliation and socio-economic development during the past period.
					
					 It sincerely wished the party greater success in its activities to strengthen it and achieving the prosperity of the country and expressed belief that the good friendly and cooperative relations between the two parties would steadily grow stronger in the future, too.

articles.title: Founding Anniversary of Russian Language Center Marked at University
articles.content:
Founding Anniversary of Russian Language Center Marked at University 
						
 Pyongyang, April 28 (KCNA) -- A meeting was held at Pyongyang University of Foreign Studies on Tuesday to mark the 6th founding anniversary of its Russian Language Center. 
					 Present at the meeting were Pak Jong Jin, rector of the university, officials concerned, teachers and students of the university, Alexandr Matsegora, Russian ambassador to the DPRK, staff members of his embassy and teachers of the embassy school.
					
					 Foreign diplomatic envoys were present on invitation.
					
					 Speeches were made.
					
					 Teaching materials donated by the Khabarovsk Territory Administration, Russia, to the DPRK were conveyed. 
					
					 The participants enjoyed art pieces presented by students.

articles.title: Universities of Physical Education to Be Established in Provinces
articles.content:
Universities of Physical Education to Be Established in Provinces
						
 Pyongyang, April 28 (KCNA) -- Universities of physical education are to be established in 6 provinces of the DPRK.
					 According to Kim Myong Su, a department director of the Ministry of Physical Culture and Sports, the universities will be established in Chongjin, North Hamgyong Province, Hyesan, Ryanggang Province, Kanggye, Jagang Province, Phyongsong, South Phyongan Province, Haeju, South Hwanghae Province and Wonsan, Kangwon Province.
					
					 There already exist Korea University of Physical Education in Pyongyang, Hamhung University of Physical Education in South Hamgyong Province, Sinuiju University of Physical Education in North Phyongan Province and Sariwon University of Physical Education in North Hwanghae Province.
					
					 The establishment of new universities will contribute to positively developing local physical culture.
					
					 Now preparations for their establishment are made in related provinces.

articles.title: Shepherd's Purse Efficacious for Cancer
articles.content:
Shepherd's Purse Efficacious for Cancer
 Pyongyang, April 28 (KCNA) -- Scientists of the DPRK recently ascertained that shepherd's purse, one of edible herbs, has rich anti-cancer substances.
					 In this regard, Kim Nam Chol, a teacher of the Pyongyang Medical College under Kim Il Sung University, told KCNA:
					
					 From olden times the Koreans have taken shepherd's purse as health food in spring, according to a historical book.
					
					 Contained in this herb is much vitamin A, which exists as β-carotin.β-carotin has been proven in recent years to be effective in preventing the risk of developing any sort of cancer.
					
					 Shepherd's purse is also good for treating hypertension, bronchial asthma and other diseases.

articles.title: Inter-Korean Dialogue Impossible amid Ceaseless Saber-rattling: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
Inter-Korean Dialogue Impossible amid Ceaseless Saber-rattling: Rodong Sinmun
						
 Pyongyang, April 28 (KCNA) -- Ill-famed Foal Eagle joint military exercise kicked off by the south Korean warmongers with the U.S. came to an end on April 24. This saber-rattling seriously affected the inter-Korean relations and the situation on the Korean peninsula. 
					 Rodong Sinmun Tuesday observes this in an article. Their muscle flexing taught a serious lesson that neither dialogue nor negotiations nor improved relations are possible under the situation where the U.S. and south Korean puppet group stage military exercises for invading the DPRK, the article notes, and goes on:
					
					 Dialogue can never go together with war exercises.
					
					 There is in south Korea a rumor that the end of Foal Eagle would help defuse the tension and pave the way for dialogue. 
					
					 However, it is too early to expect dialogue, cooperation and improved relations now that the south Korean authorities show no willingness to terminate the military exercises with the U.S. 
					
					 They plan to stage Ulji Freedom Guardian military drills in south Korea from coming August which is little short of Key Resolve and Foal Eagle. 
					
					 It is the height of shamelessness for the south Korean authorities to talk about "dialogue and cooperation", feigning ignorance of the dangerous saber-rattling staged by them with the U.S. to carry out their sinister scenario for invading the DPRK. 
					
					 They should draw a due lesson from the catastrophic consequences entailed by their reckless military exercises against the DPRK and make a bold decision to put an end to them before talking about "dialogue".
					
					 They had better behave themselves, facing up to the trend of the times and the desire of the compatriots.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Slams Japan's Pro-U.S. Diplomatic Policy towards DPRK
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Slams Japan's Pro-U.S. Diplomatic Policy towards DPRK
						
 Pyongyang, April 28 (KCNA)-- If Japan truly wants the security of the country, it should stop toeing the U.S. line but think and act with its own senses, says Rodong Sinmun Tuesday in an article.
					 It goes on:
					
					 Japan has always shaped its diplomatic policy towards the DPRK and behaved without any principle, reading the minds of the U.S. 
					
					 The article cites facts to prove that since the DPRK-Japan inter-governmental talks held in Stockholm in May last year, Japan has pursued pro-U.S. diplomatic policy towards the DPRK.
					
					 Japan put main emphasis on the issue of abduction, sidestepping the main issue of improving the DPRK-Japan relations, and laid an obstacle in the way of implementing the DPRK-Japan inter-governmental agreement, paying heed to what the U.S. uttered. 
					
					 Japan has deliberately infringed upon the sovereignty of the DPRK with its sinister political aim. It cracked down upon the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan as a challenge to the DPRK, not content with playing the role of a shock brigade in kicking up the anti-DPRK human right racket, pursuant to the U.S. policy. This touched off bitter hatred of the Korean people for Japan.
					
					 It is ridiculous for Japan to handle the issue of the DPRK-Japan relations with the calculation that the increasing pressure put by it upon the DPRK with the U.S. backing would work on the DPRK. 
					
					 The Japanese reactionaries pretend ignorance of what is happening, dodging the liquidation of their past crimes. 
					
					 It is only Japan which persistently refuses to reflect on its crime-woven history. 
					
					 Japan is sadly mistaken if it thinks the DPRK expects something from the improvement of the DPRK-Japan relations.
					
					 If Japan goes reckless while dancing to the tune of the U.S. hostile to the DPRK, it can never have its security guaranteed and its behavior will only entail catastrophic consequences.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Raps U.S. Attempt to Boost Nuclear Cooperation
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Raps U.S. Attempt to Boost Nuclear Cooperation
						
 Pyongyang, April 28 (KCNA) -- Brass hats of the U.S. are making much ado about "threat", claiming that the DPRK is "capable of firing ICBMs tipped with nuclear warheads at the U.S. mainland."
					 Meanwhile, the U.S. and its allies are crying out for intensifying the "joint counteraction to force north Korea to dismantle its nukes" now that not only Northeast Asia but the U.S. mainland are "within the range of nuclear strike by north Korea."
					
					 Commenting on this, Rodong Sinmun Tuesday says: 
					
					 Lurking behind this is a cynic ploy to intentionally hype the "nuclear threat from the north" in a bid to achieve their sinister purpose.
					
					 Their scenario is aimed to secure the pretexts for deploying THAAD in south Korea, revising the "U.S.-Japan defense cooperation guidelines", establishing the mechanism for U.S.-Japan-south Korea "triangular cooperation" and resuming the six-party talks.
					
					 What should not overlooked is that they are busy building up public opinion critical of the DPRK's capability for developing nuclear weapons, vociferating about its "technology of producing smaller nukes". It is aimed to impair the ever-mounting dignity of the DPRK and its international prestige and throw a wet blanket over the friendly attitude of the international community towards it. By making much fuss about "the nuclear threat from the north" the U.S. and the south Korean puppet forces seek to keep cooperation in the nuclear racket against the DPRK from collapsing and increase pressure upon it.
					
					 However, they are seriously mistaken. Their sinister plots will only harden the determination and will of the DPRK to strongly react to their blatant challenge.
					
					 The U.S. and its allies should clearly understand that the DPRK will never allow anyone to encroach upon its nuclear sovereignty and fundamental interests.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Slams U.S. Moves to Knock into Shape NATO of Asian Version
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Slams U.S. Moves to Knock into Shape NATO of Asian Version 
						
 Pyongyang, April 28 (KCNA) -- The "4D operation plan" has been worked out since the U.S. secretary of Defense visited Japan and south Korea. It was reported that it would be carried out by the U.S.-south Korea "Deterrent Strategy Committee" to be set up in south Korea.
					 Rodong Sinmun Tuesday observes in a commentary in this regard: 
					
					 This clearly proves that the U.S. is working with bloodshot eyes to conceal its true colors as provocateur by convincing the world that its bankrupt propaganda about "threat" from the DPRK remains an established fact. 
					
					 The U.S. is pulling up the DPRK over its war deterrence in a bid to form a NATO-type military bloc in the Asia-Pacific region for the purpose of containing regional big powers through military edge and realizing its ambition for domination, the commentary notes, and goes on:
					
					 The U.S. regards it as the best ideal to form NATO of Asian version in order to carry out its strategy for dominating the Asia-Pacific region.
					
					 The U.S. secretary of Defense's recent visit to Japan and south Korea was aimed to intensify the triangular cooperation in which the U.S. plays the role of midwife.
					
					 The U.S. is stepping up the conclusion of the Trans-Pacific Partnership (TPP). Its scenario is designed to expand such economic bloc as TPP to a union of politics, diplomacy, etc. in a long-term plan in an effort to use it in favor of containing regional big powers and carrying out its strategy for world domination.
					
					 It is quite clear that such moves of the U.S. will result in escalating tension in the Asia-Pacific region and expand the structure of the Cold War formed on the Korean peninsula to the region.

articles.title: U.S. Disqualified to Talk About "Human Rights": Minju Joson
articles.content:
U.S. Disqualified to Talk About "Human Rights": Minju Joson
						
 Pyongyang, April 28 (KCNA) -- World media give much coverage to news of human rights abuses in the U.S. these days, a clear proof that it is a kingpin of human rights abuses and the worst abuser.  Minju Joson on Tuesday says this in a commentary. 
					 It goes on:
					
					 The U.S. never misses a chance to talk volumes about "human rights" but nobody with sound way of thinking pays heed to it. 
					
					 It is mainly because the U.S. is a country which has no qualifications to talk about human rights.
					
					 The Americans do not hesitate to commit human rights abuses in other countries, as they do in their own country.
					
					 It is a tragedy that the Americans accuse others of violating "human rights" and behave as if they were "human rights judges" though they are human butchers without equals.
					
					 It is said that everybody is equal before the law. Nobody has given the U.S. privilege to be free from legal liability. The U.S. should be brought to justice for hideous human rights abuses. 
					
					 The U.S. should be well aware of its poor position and stop at once taking issue with "human rights" issues of others.

articles.title: Minju Joson Urges U.S., South Korea to Behave Themselves
articles.content:
Minju Joson Urges U.S., South Korea to Behave Themselves
						
 Pyongyang, April 28 (KCNA) -- There took place the 7th KIDD meeting in Washington on April 14 at which south Korea and the U.S. agreed to merge the "extended deterrence policy committee" and "committee for coping with missiles" into "deterrence strategic committee". 
					 They were also closeted over the issue of elaborating on the 
					
					4D operation concept" to put it on the level of OPlAN in contingency on the Korean peninsula. 
					
					 Minju Joson Tuesday says in a commentary that this is a revelation of their sinister scenario to round off the plan for a preemptive nuclear attack on the DPRK on the stage of an actual war and thus justify their moves for igniting a nuclear war any moment. 
					
					 What they agreed is nothing but a third rate plot to justify the deployment of THAAD in south Korea and tighten the military nexus among the U.S., Japan and south Korea, the article notes, and goes on:
					
					 The U.S. blinded with a wild ambition for world domination is busy developing latest nuclear hardware to ship them into south Korea and its vicinity, It is staging madcap nuclear war drills against the DPRK every year, rendering the situation on the peninsula extremely tense. Pursuant to the U.S. policy, the south Korean puppet group is offering south Korea to the U.S. as its advanced base for a nuclear war and is busy purchasing U.S. made weaponry with money collected from the people as taxes, laying bare true colors as a colonial stooge and war servant.
					
					 The U.S. and the south Korean puppet group dared disclose their scenario for preemptive nuclear strike at the DPRK. This is as foolish an act as inviting a nuclear disaster themselves.
					
					 Preemptive nuclear strike is not a monopoly of the U.S.
					
					 They should properly know who their rival is and had better behave themselves.

articles.title: KCNA Commentary Slams U.S. Daydream
articles.content:
KCNA Commentary Slams U.S. Daydream
						
 Pyongyang, April 28 (KCNA) -- The United States is kicking up much fuss, claiming that the DPRK's army has reached the level of making a nuclear strike at the U.S. mainland.
					 William Gortney, commander of the U.S. northern forces, in a press conference held at the U.S. Defense Department said that the U.S. military judged that "north Korea is capable of firing ICBMs tipped with smaller nuclear warheads at the U.S. mainland".
					
					 The commander of the U.S. forces in south Korea and the commander-in-chief of the U.S. forces in the Pacific echoed Gortney's utterances at the Senate Armed Services Committee. 
					
					 In the past the U.S. refused to admit the existence of nuclear weapons in the DPRK, negating its access to nuclear weapons. 
					
					 The U.S., however, made a U turn, working hard to build up public opinion on the DPRK's smaller nukes and its capability to make a nuclear strike at the U.S. mainland. Then why? 
					
					 It is seeking to attain its aim by periodically escalating the tension on the Korean peninsula.
					
					 It merits attention that the chairman of the Senate Armed Services Committee let loose a litany of invectives against the DPRK, asserting  that the "threat from north Korea makes the situation on the Korean peninsula unpredictable and it is a main factor of making the situation there unstable" in the same place where the commander of the U.S. forces in south Korea and the commander-in-chief of the U.S. forces in the Pacific made a hue and cry over "north Korea's missile strike at the U.S. mainland."
					
					 In a word, lurking behind the above-said claim is a sinister intention to gain a double purpose of smoothly pushing forward the pivot to Asia-Pacific strategy by staging a charade for straining the situation on the peninsula and bringing bigger profits to the U.S. munitions monopolies.
					
					 The assistant secretary of State for disarmament verification blustered at a recent seminar sponsored by the U.S. Centre for Strategic and International Studies that the U.S. and south Korea were not negotiating for the deployment of THAAD at present but its deployment in south Korea would prove a decisive force for "coping with north Korea's missiles".
					
					 Commenting on this, U.S. media said that those remarks reflected the U.S. Administration's "strong political will" to deploy THAAD on the peninsula at any cost under the pretext of "countering the nuclear missiles of north Korea".
					
					 As it is well-known to everybody, the deployment of THAAD in south Korea constitutes a main link in the chain efforts to implement the U.S. pivot to Asia-Pacific strategy.
					
					 By deploying THAAD in south Korea the U.S. seeks to disable the strategic nuclear forces of potential rivals in Asia-Pacific region, notably Russia and China, and hold a military edge over the region. 
					
					 The deployment of very costly THAAD would bring a windfall to the U.S. munitions monopolies. 
					
					 In the final analysis, the U.S. required the spread of fiction about "nuclear missile threat from north Korea" and periodical escalation of tension on the peninsula to serve the purpose of THAAD deployment. 
					
					 The U.S., however, had better discard its daydream of achieving a double purpose.
					
					 The service personnel and people in the DPRK keep high vigilance against the U.S. cunning scenario to fish in troubled waters by employing a trite method.
					
					 The U.S. would be well advised to bear in mind that it will meet a tragic fate of ruin, if it behaves recklessly, failing to properly know who its rival is.

articles.title: S. Korean Body Demands Japan Stop Discrimination and Suppression of Koreans in Japan
articles.content:
S. Korean Body Demands Japan Stop Discrimination and Suppression of Koreans in Japan
						
 Pyongyang, April 28 (KCNA) -- The Citizens Meeting for Protecting Our Class and Children held a press conference outside the Japanese embassy in Seoul on April 24 to declare a week of human rights of Koreans in Japan at which it declared it would fight against the Japanese government's discrimination against Korean schools, according to Thongil News, an internet paper of south Korea.
					 Speakers said that all Korean schools in Japan are still excluded from the application of tuition-free program for senior high schools.
					
					 They noted they would not allow the Japanese government to undisguisedly pursue the policy of national discrimination, far from liquidating the past crimes.
					
					 They demanded Japan stop at once discrimination and suppression of Koreans in Japan.
					
					 In a press release they said that they declared a week of human rights of Koreans in Japan in token of solidarity with compatriots defending the national education on the occasion of the day of the April 24 education action in which Koreans in Japan fought against the moves of the Japanese authorities to obliterate national education in order to defend Korean language.
					
					 An action plan till May 1 was made public at the end of the conference.

articles.title: S. Korean Organization Slams Puppet Policemen's Human Rights Abuses
articles.content:
S. Korean Organization Slams Puppet Policemen's Human Rights Abuses
						
 Pyongyang, April 28 (KCNA) -- The Emergency Action against Cyber Inspection, the south Korean civic organization, on April 23 held a press conference outside the building of the puppet Seoul Metropolitan Police Agency denouncing the fascist policemen for their human rights abuses.
					 Speakers accused the police of walked off 100 participants in the all-people meeting and demonstration held on April 18 on the occasion of one year since the ferry Sewol disaster.
					
					 While conducting investigation into them, the police committed such human rights abuses as forcibly seizing mobile phones, fumbling their bodies and pressurizing them to tell secret numbers. 
					
					 At the end of the conference, members of the organization thrust a protest letter to the Seoul Metropolitan Police Agency.

articles.title: S. Korean Warmongers Plan to Stage North-targeted War Drill in Forefront Area
articles.content:
S. Korean Warmongers Plan to Stage North-targeted War Drill in Forefront Area
						
 Pyongyang, April 28 (KCNA) -- The Third Corps of the south Korean puppet army announced it would stage large-scale field mobile drill in Rinje and Yanggu areas of south Korean Kangwon Province from April 27 to May 1, according to KBS of south Korea.
					 The puppet warmongers blustered they would fire blank shells with huge forces and arms and equipment involved in the drill, raising a hue and cry over "enemy's infiltration and local war".
					
					 They are mulling staging a provocative military drill in the forefront areas once again in a bid to bring a nuclear war disaster to the Korean peninsula at any cost.

articles.title: S. Korean Paper Calls for Investigation into Chief Executive
articles.content:
S. Korean Paper Calls for Investigation into Chief Executive 
						
 Pyongyang, April 28 (KCNA) -- The south Korean internet paper Minjok Ilbo on April 24 carried an article calling for investigation into the puppet chief executive. 
					 The editorial said that Park Geun Hye's close associates are making desperate efforts to tide over the crisis after the disclosure of the whole story about the Song Wang Jong case in which they were involved. 
					
					 Those in charge of the management of funds during the election, in particular, are making a desperate bid to deny any linkage with the Song Wang Jong case and the funds for the "presidential election", the editorial noted, adding:
					
					 The above-said case irrefutably proves that the past "presidential election" was the election in which the Intelligence Service and the Cyber Command and other power bodies were involved and a fraudulent election in which illicit political funds amounting to astronomical figures paid by businessmen dominated.
					
					 The people will turn out in massive resistance if investigation is not made into the chief executive, to begin with, warns the editorial.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Off Press in Nigeria
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Off Press in Nigeria
 Pyongyang, April 28 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un's work "On Effecting a Drastic Turn in Land Management to Meet the Requirements for Building a Thriving Socialist Nation" was brought out in booklet by the N. K. Publishing House in Enugu, Nigeria.
					 The work, published on April 27, Juche 101 (2012), deals with the exploits performed by President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il in the land management and indicates the general orientation and tasks to be fulfilled to face-lift the land as befitting the appearance of a thriving socialist nation.
					
					 A book releasing ceremony took place on April 20.

articles.title: Feats of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il Praised by Foreign Body, Personage
articles.content:
Feats of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il Praised by Foreign Body, Personage
						
 Pyongyang, April 28 (KCNA) -- An Italian organization and Brazilian personage made public a statement and article on April 14 and 17 on the occasion of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					 The Italy-DPRK Association for Friendship and Solidarity said in a statement that the Korean people are dynamically advancing along the road indicated by Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il under the guidance of Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK.
					
					 The instructions given by Kim Il Sung indicate the road to be followed by not only the Korean people but oppressed people in the world in their struggle and serve as important guidelines under the present international situation where the U.S. imperialists and their stooges are suppressing people in every part of the world, the statement noted.
					
					 Kim Jong Il opened a decisive phase for building a thriving nation and clearly indicated the road to be followed by the DPRK with his indefatigable guidance till the last moments of his great life.
					
					 Rosanita Campos, vice-president of the Party for Free Motherland of Brazil, in an article dedicated to the paper Hora do Povo praised the revolutionary career and exploits of Kim Il Sung, saying April 15 is his birth anniversary.
					
					 It was thanks to the Songun politics pursued by Kim Jong Il that the DPRK emerged a satellite manufacturer and launcher and nuclear weapons state, the vice-president noted, praising his Songun revolutionary leadership feats.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Feats Praised by Russian Political Party, Brazilian Bodies
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Feats Praised by Russian Political Party, Brazilian Bodies
						
 Pyongyang, April 28 (KCNA) -- A Russian political party and Brazilian organizations posted on their websites special write-ups illustrated with portraits of smiling President Kim Il Sung on the occasion of his birth anniversary.
					 The Khabarovsk Territorial Committee of the Communist Party of the Russian Federation said in an article titled "Model of internationalists (on the occasion of the 103rd birth anniversary of Comrade Kim Il Sung)" on April 11 that he sincerely assisted the Chinese revolution and defended the Soviet Union with arms during the arduous anti-Japanese armed struggle he waged without support of a regular army and state-backing home front to liberate Korea from Japan's military occupation.
					
					 He rendered material and moral assistance to the people of the countries struggling for independence against imperialism under the difficult situation where the Korean people were building socialism amid constant confrontation with the U.S. imperialists, the boss of world imperialism, after the Korean war, the article said, and went on:
					
					 More than 20 years have passed since his demise but he is always remembered by progressive mankind as a noble model of internationalists.
					
					 The Brazilian Committee for Solidarity with the DPRK posted an article titled "Comrade Kim Il Sung is the eternal sun of Juche" on April 14.
					
					 The Brazilian Center for the Study of the Juche Idea also posted an article on April 9 in praise of the immortal exploits and noble personality of Kim Il Sung who ushered in the era of independence and dedicated his whole life to the triumphant advance of the global cause of independence.

articles.title: Day of Sun Observed in India
articles.content:
Day of Sun Observed in India
						
 Pyongyang, April 28 (KCNA) -- An Indian national seminar took place in New Delhi on April 20 to mark the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung (the Day of the Sun.)
					 On display at its venue were photos documenting feats of the President, leader Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Books introducing Songun Korea were also on display.
					
					 Present there were the former chairperson of the Delhi Bureau for Rural Development, personages of the Indian Youth Group for the Study of Comrade Kim Il Sung's Works, the Association for the Study of Kim Jong Il's Works, the Juche Idea Study Society of Indian Delhi, Delhi University, followers of the Juche idea and the secretary general of the Asian Regional Institute of the Juche Idea.
					
					 Present there on invitation were the DPRK ambassador and his embassy officials in New Delhi.
					
					 The floor was taken by the former chairperson of the Delhi Bureau for Rural Development, the chairman of the Association for the Study of Kim Jong Il's Works and a professor at Delhi University.
					
					 The speakers praised Kim Il Sung as the prominent leader who founded the Juche idea, indicating the road for accomplishing the human cause of independence.
					
					 HE Kim Jong Il was a great leader who led the Korean revolution to a shining victory through his Songun politics, they said, adding the Songun idea of the DPRK is the most just in the light of the present situation.
					
					 The Songun revolutionary cause of the President and Kim Jong Il is being successfully carried forward by Kim Jong Un, the supreme leader of the Korean people, they added.

articles.title: Korean Book, Photo and Handicraft Exhibition Opens in Bulgaria
articles.content:
Korean Book, Photo and Handicraft Exhibition Opens in Bulgaria
						
 Pyongyang, April 28 (KCNA) -- A Korean book, photo and handicraft exhibition opened on Apr. 21 to observe the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung and the 40th anniversary of his visit to Dobric  City (then Tolbukhin) of Bulgaria.
					 On display there were works of President Kim Il Sung, leader Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un, books and photos introducing Songun Korea and fine art pieces showing creative skills of the Korean people.
					
					 Present at its opening ceremony were the chairman of the Bulgarian Communists Union and personages of various circles in the city including its mayor. The DPRK ambassador and his embassy officials were present there on invitation.
					
					 Kameliya Koiceva, vice-mayor of the city, in a speech at the ceremony recollected that citizens warmly welcomed Kim Il Sung visiting the city, adding:
					
					 The younger generation should know well about the history of friendship between Bulgaria and the DPRK.
					
					 Many things have changed but the friendship between the peoples of the two countries can never change.
					
					 I hope the exhibition will positively contribute to promoting the friendship between the two countries and boosting cultural cooperation and exchange.
					
					 A congratulatory message to Kim Jong Un was adopted at the ceremony.

articles.title: German Body Backs Appeal of Regional Body for Supporting Korea's Reunification
articles.content:
German Body Backs Appeal of Regional Body for Supporting Korea's Reunification
						
 Pyongyang, April 28 (KCNA) -- The Anti-Imperialist Forum of Germany released a statement on Apr. 20 in support of the appeal made by the Asia-Pacific Regional Committee for Supporting Peaceful Reunification of Korea.
					 The statement said:
					
					 This year marks the 70th anniversary of Korea's liberation the Korean people achieved by defeating Japan through a heroic resistance war.
					
					 The world has advanced far and the times have undergone a dramatic change but the Korean people have not yet achieved the country's reunification.
					
					 The pain resulting from national division is getting bitterer.
					
					 The Asia-Pacific Regional Committee for Supporting Peaceful Reunification of Korea set the "solidarity period for supporting the independent and peaceful reunification of Korea" from June to October this year and made an appeal to progressive mankind for further intensifying the international solidarity movement for supporting the Korean people's cause.
					
					 The Korean people will certainly achieve the independent and peaceful reunification of the country under the wise leadership of HE Kim Jong Un and other progressive peoples in the world will extend support and solidarity to the reunification cause of the Korean people.
					
					 We fully support the appeal.

articles.title: Japanese Authorities Accused of Suppressing Chongryon
articles.content:
Japanese Authorities Accused of Suppressing Chongryon
						
 Pyongyang, April 28 (KCNA) -- Political parties and organizations of various countries released statements between April 9 and 13 in protest against the Japanese authorities' crackdown upon the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon). 
					 The mission of the Communist Party of Chile in Cuba noted in its statement: 
					
					 We vehemently denounce as an immoral act the Japanese police authorities' search for the houses of the chairman and a vice-chairman of the Central Standing Committee of Chongryon who are deputies to the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK and leading officials of its legitimate overseas citizens' organization. 
					
					 This is undoubtedly an insult to the sovereignty of the DPRK and human rights abuse against Koreans in Japan.
					
					 The Italy-DPRK Association for Friendship and Solidarity noted: 
					
					 Japan perpetrated a shameful act of mercilessly trampling down even elementary human rights, taking advantage of the U.S. imperialists' hostile policy toward the DPRK. This is an open hostile action against the DPRK and Chongryon.
					
					 Protesting against the Japanese reactionaries' unjust search for the houses of Chongryon officials which will only deteriorate the DPRK-Japan relations, we fully support Chongryon and Koreans in Japan.
					
					 The Slovenia-Korea Friendship Association denounced the Japanese police authorities' suppression of Chongryon and urged the Japanese regime to respect the rights of Koreans in Japan including their right to existence.

articles.title: Choe Thae Bok departe con secretario general de UIP
articles.content:
Choe Thae Bok departe con secretario general de UIP
Pyongyang, 28 de abril (ACNC) -- Tuvieron lugar el dia 28 en el capitalino Palacio de los Congresos Mansudae las conversaciones entre el presidente de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Choe Thae Bok, y el secretario general de la Union Interparlamentaria, Martin Chungong.
					Estuvieron presentes aqui la vicepresidenta de la APS, Ri Hye Jong, y otros funcionarios por la parte coreana y por la contraparte, la comitiva de Martin Chungong.
					
					Ambas partes intercambiaron las opiniones sobre el desarrollo de las relaciones entre la APS de la RPDC y la UIP y otros asuntos de interes mutuo.

articles.title: Se abriran institutos superiores de cultura fisica en 6 provincias coreanas
articles.content:
Se abriran institutos superiores de cultura fisica en 6 provincias coreanas
						
Pyongyang, 28 de abril (ACNC) -- De acuerdo con el director del Ministerio de Deportes, Kim Myong Su, se fundaran los institutos superiores de cultura fisica en las provincias de Hamgyong del Norte (en la ciudad de Chongjin), Ryanggang (Hyesan), Jagang (Kanggye), Phyong-an del Sur (Phyongsong), Hwanghae del Sur (Haeju) y Kangwon (Wonsan).
					El objetivo de instauracion de nuevos planteles docentes reside en formar mucho mas funcionarios, cientificos, entrenadores competentes que contribuiran a la construccion de potencia deportiva.
					
					Ya existen en Pyongyang, las provincias de Hamgyong del Sur, Phyong-an del Norte y Hwanghae del Norte el Instituto Superior de Cultura Fisica de Corea, el Instituto Superior de Cultura Fisica de Hamhung, el Instituto Superior de Cultura Fisica de Sinuiju y el Instituto Superior de Cultura Fisica de Sariwon, respectivamente. 
					
					La fundacion de los nuevos institutos producira cambios radicales en el desarrollo deportivo en general, inclusive el deporte masivo y el deporte escolar de las respectivas localidades.
					
					Marchan bien ahora en las provincias los preparativos de fundacion.
